channel.title: How do i make varrock a safe zone?
channel.description:
Somehow my Varrock changed to a pk zone. The safe spots are still the dummy room and east bank. When you walk it you can be attacked, though. Can anyone tell me the code to make it a safe zone below the wilderness line or atleast Varrock?
Help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks.

item.title: How do i make varrock a safe zone?
item.dc:creator: @The_Her0 The Her0
item.description:
@The_Her0 wrote:

I did that and it gave me 100 errors. Here is what it looks like with your code:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3276 && absX <= 3135 && absY >= 3521 && absY <=3382 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| (absX >= [X Coords here SW] && absX <= [X Coords here NE] && absY >= [Y Coords here SW] && absY <=[Y Coords here NE] ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Here are the errors:

item.source: How do i make varrock a safe zone?

item.title: How do i make varrock a safe zone?
item.dc:creator: @Mitch1 Mitch ™
item.description:
@Mitch1 wrote:

Open up client.java and search for:

public boolean nonwild

Paste this at the end of the list:

(absX >= [X Coords here SW] && absX <= [X Coords here NE] && absY >= [Y Coords here SW] && absY <=[Y Coords here NE] ) ||

Then just fill it out, Save, Compile, Enjoy!
If you have any trouble… add me on msn and i will help you: Mitch-93@Hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make varrock a safe zone?
item.dc:creator: @The_Her0 The Her0
item.description:
@The_Her0 wrote:

I did that but it didn’t work. I entered new coords in the first parenthesis. Can anyone paste their coords, if your Varrock is a safe zone, from client.java here please? I’m using fr33sc4p3.

Here’s my coords now:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3276 && absX <= 3135 && absY >= 3521 && absY <=3382 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Thanks for everyones help.

Read full topic
